tool.name: BarPlotsAdaptSearch
tool.description: Builds barplots based on MutCount (concatenated mode) results

param.name: input
param.label: Table
param.help: csv file with counts and frequencies of codons, amino-acids, or amino-acids types (outputs of MutCount in 'concatenated' mode)

param.name: tree
param.label: Newick tree computed by ConcatPhyl (RAxML best tree)
param.help: The tree is used to order the species in the heatmap

tool.help:
@HELP_AUTHORS@
**Description**
This tool display, on barplots, the results of codons/amino-acids/amino-acids types counts and frequencies computed by The tool MutCount (in concatenated mode)
--------
**Parameters**
- Table : one a csv file computed byt the tool 'MutCount' in 'Concatenated mode' : codons_freqs.csv, aa_freqs.csv, or amino_acids_types.csv - What to plot : you can choose to plot only counts or frequencies (one output file), or both (two output files)
--------
**Outputs**
one or two collection of histograms (one per species), plotting counts or/and counts and frequencies.
--------
**The AdaptSearch Pipeline**
